synopsis.text: The world has found solace in the popular card game, Shadowverse, leading to the establishment of Shadovar College, a prestigious institution dedicated to nurturing professional players. Enter Light Tenryu, a new student at Shadovar, who finds himself drawn to 'Seventh Flame,' one of the seven elite Shadowverse clubs. However, Seventh Flame is teetering on the brink of dissolution due to a lack of members. Determined to save the club, Light embarks on a mission to recruit new members, but his journey is fraught with formidable adversaries, each armed with an impressive array of cards. As Light and his friends delve deeper into the world of Shadowverse, they are joined by Dragneel, a new digital friend. How will this new ally influence Light's journey and the future of Seventh Flame? Join Light Tenryu in this thrilling adventure that promises to unveil new facets of the beloved card game, Shadowverse.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
